<DIV>It would be very difficult to "ghost hunt" using spirit boxes an=
yway, since the people who talk through spirit boxes are too many, and at v=
arious levels over there, the so called "ghosts" are those people still in =
lower plains of existence and they too will have their chance to go over in=
to the light.  sf</DIV>
<DIV> </DIV>
<DIV>
<DIV>In a message date=
d 11/8/2011 3:30:48 A.M. Eastern Standard Time, purplealiengirl@... w=
rites:</DIV>
<BLOCKQUOTE style=3D"BORDER-LEFT: blue 2px solid"><FONT style=
=3D"BACKGROUND-COLOR: transparent" color=3D#000000 size=3D2 face=3DArial><S=
PAN> </SPAN> 
<DIV id=3Dygrp-text>
<P>
<DIV> The purpose of the b=
ox--aka a swept radio is to provide a source of broken speech and other sou=
nd--known as raw audio--a term borrowed from EVPmaker, which the entities u=
se to form their voices. All these self proclaimed geniuses and experts mak=
ing all kinds of claims about how they improve the boxes, have no clue abou=
t how it works. It's only function is to develop raw audio, it make no diff=
erence how the sweep is done, it can be done by hand, it can be just a very=
 small portion of any given radio band, it can just tune a radio between st=
ations on a night when there is skip, distant stations fading in and out. R=
adio is just one way of developing raw audio. </DIV>
<DIV> </DIV>
<DIV=
> So, explain to me how some over complicated sweep mode  is goin=
g to make an improvement. If ya want self aggrandizement, go over to H=
ultays group, RTSC.</DIV>
<DIV> </DIV>
<DIV> True, I don't s=
upport ghost hunting, cuz I think it's a focus on darkness, but that doesn'=
t mean the boxes don't work in those conditions, and there aren't any valid=
 responses from it.  I can turn on a box anytime day or nigh=
t, and someone--disembodied--presumably, is right there to start talking, e=
ven with the lights on. When I see the BS on TV, everyone sitting in t=
he dark--I'm thinking what is wrong with these people!? When someone says t=
hey need boxes or that kind of research, I am not going to take you serious=
, it means you have no idea what this is. You think spirit is some kin=
d of mindless zombie stuck in abandoned buildings--pure Hollywood! That hau=
nting idea is so ingrained, and programmed into people that y'all would rat=
her believe I am some lying thieving SOB than question your reality. <=
/DIV>
<DIV> </DIV>
<DIV> I don't need this crap, I do this "resea=
rch" for my own curiosity, and I still believe it was a mistake--a huge mis=
take-- to share the box idea. Humanity has no clue how to use it, what=
 it's for, and it ain't to make one rich and famous.  </DIV>
<DIV>&nbs=
p;</DIV>
<DIV> Besides, who the hell is anyone to say what the boxes a=
nd EVP tell me about myself and who I am, as well as a verity of topics, &n=
bsp;to say they know better? </DIV>
<DIV> </DIV>
<DIV> </DIV>
